fields.name: Maintenance
fields.comment: General maintenance on buildings - gutters, electrical, plumbing, etc.

fields.name: Repairs
fields.comment: Property repairs assumed to be accidental or normal wear and tear.

fields.name: Improvements and requests
fields.comment: Building or grounds improvements or requests by staff. E.g. painting, building, shelving, installations, etc.

fields.name: Health and Safety
fields.comment: Any work, repairs or improvements that can be related to health and safety requirements.

fields.name: Fields
fields.comment: Any work on fields, mowing, repair, fertilising, seeding, line-marking.

fields.name: Gardens
fields.comment: Any work on gardens, weeding, planting, pruning, edging, etc.
